Summary: UFO chased by another flying object
divs: sighting detailssometime between 6:15 and 6:30 am on 11\06\07, i witnessed two lights in the sky. looking west from my backyard, i saw two lights moving generally from southwest to northeast (though actual movement may have been anywhere between that and true south to north). there was a relatively larger solid white light apparently being pursued by a smaller white light. speed was difficult to determine, but appeared to be close to that of commercial airliners. as i watched, the smaller object drew nearer to the larger object, but never caught up by the time that they became obscured by the trees to my north. i saw no lights flashing on either object, which is what caused me to continue to watch them, since i usually see the lights of commercial airplanes flashing. there were no major changes in speed of either object, although the smaller of the two failed to catch the larger, so i suspect one slowed down or sped up. in answer to the points to include: 1) i had just returned from filling up the family car with gas and was returning into my house from the back patio. 2) i noticed the objects because there were two of them moving in the same direction, which is unusual. the fact that there were no flashing lights as seen on most planes also seemed unusual. finally, the fact that they were of different sizes suggested it was not two military jets on the way to either of the bases to the east of me. 3) i first assumed the objects were planes, but as i looked closely, i could not discern an airplane shape. i just now (5:15 pm same day) watched a commercial jet fly overhead at cruising altitude and i could make out the wings. i couldn't see any wings on the larger one for certain. at this point, i would be unable to swear that the smaller one did not have wings, but i don't recall thinking that at the time. although, based on size and movement, it left the encounter thinking that i had witnessed a small military jet chasing a larger ufo. 4) object was bright white, oval, and far away. flew in a straight line. smaller one drew nearer to it from behind, but did not catch it. 5) i was surprised by what i was seeing, because it was so unusual. we live near an airport and have military bases to our east; i'm used to planes. i haven't seen planes look or behave that way before. there were no unusual flying maneuvers, but the fact that they were going the same way and apparently so close was striking. i tried to dismiss it as planes, but i'm not convinced that they were, though one or both may have been. the sun was coming up at the time, so i'm unsure whether the steady white light of them may have been a reflection from it and may have been bright enough to cover flashing lights, so i'm still not sure what i saw. 6) flew behind trees to my north.
